Import the data set

```{r}
library(data.table)
```


```{r}
pokemon <- fread("./inputs/Pokemon.csv")
```


```{r}
colnames(pokemon)
```

```{r}
# question: how to I order things
pokemon[, .(count = .N),"Type 1"]
```

```{r}
pokemon[, .(average = mean(Total)), "Type 1"]
```
